divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside getting some fresh air and i noticed a glowing ball flying in the sky.When i first saw it i thought it was a meteor.It was glowing and it was traveling in a straight line heading southeast.I was shocked and scared when i saw it and after.I lost sight of it because it flew far away.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 4 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around January 1st 2012
Summary: glowing orb that traveled in a straight line heading southeast
